# Hvar veiða menn hrognkelsi

```{r,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyrOracle)
library(mar)
mar <- src_oracle("mar")
```

```{r,fig.width=7}
afli_grasl(mar) %>% 
  filter(ar==2015) %>% 
  collect(n=Inf) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(lon,lat)) + 
  geom_polygon(data=geo::bisland) + 
  geom_jitter(col='red',aes(size=fj_grasl),alpha=0.1)+ coord_map()
```
